Html: AMA does not show in the list. I have put in in place. Word was reseted... dozen times. The whole Mac was reseted, twice. If I put the whole new pack of styles only ABNT (both) and ASA* show. Can you please help me?

It looks like MacOS has problem with some encoding types.

Try the following and let me know if that fixes things: open each .XSL file with TextEdit on MacOS and just click "File" "Save" (you don't have to change anything in the file). Then restart Word and check again.

I updated the styles in the default release to no longer have byte order marks in them. This should fix the issue for all styles.

Note that individual releases of a style are not yet updated!

Thank you! Tomorrow I will look into it and will let you know if it works.
